body: It seems she's partially cheating on her boyfriend. She met up with mc to complain about her bf. I said partially because we don't know what's the content of her complain. Could mean he was cheating on her too. After she got drunk, she started advancing on mc. In the end when mc confessed to her that he likes her, she replied that she likes him too. And she told him to meet up again and he agreed. Some time later he received a message from her to meet up. End.
Idk why is there a cheating tag but id rather not have it translated
